heading: How good are European teenagers at reading?
subheading: According to the 2022 PISA survey, the average reading proficiency level among 15-year-olds in the EU has reached a historic low, with around one in four failing to reach the minimum required level. 30% of them do not have the minimum required mathematical skills, while around 25% struggle with reading and science.
textNote: According to PISA, the minimum proficiency level in reading is Level 2, which corresponds to a score of at least 407 score points.
